twitch.title: Twitch OAuth
twitch.description: Configure your Twitch OAuth application credentials. You can get these from the Twitch Developer Console.
twitch.clientSecretHelp: Your Twitch application Client Secret (keep this secure)

login.title: Welcome to MyHomeGames
login.subtitle: Please login to continue
login.credentialsNeeded: Twitch OAuth credentials are required to login. Please configure them in Settings first.
login.configureFirst: You can get your Twitch Client ID and Client Secret from the Twitch Developer Console.
